pageTitle: Deputy Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Tuesday, February 18, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

11:30 a.m. The Deputy Prime Minister will appear before the House of Commons Standing Committee on International Trade regarding Bill C-4, An Act to implement the Agreement between Canada, the United States of America and the United Mexican States.

225A West Block
Parliament Hill

Notes for media:

  • Journalists who are not members of the Canadian Parliamentary Press Gallery will require accreditation from the gallery in advance. For more information, contact Pierre Cuguen at 613-992-6517.
  • The Deputy Prime Minister will hold a media availability in the Foyer of the House of Commons following her appearance at the Standing Committee.
